name: Fantasy Farmers
description: A simple game with the idea of "growth" made for a game jam. It was a great opportunity to meet people and work together. Special thanks to my teammates: the man who coded like crazy, Nostro Vostro; the supreme artist DezWave; audio and cover expert !F!ERCE!; spawnking Okavin, and lastly myself who helped with UI among other things, ItzDubz.
